title: This Portfolio Website
description: This website is built from the ground up by myself, from creating the design in Figma, coding it up using Nuxt, and deploying it on Netlify
body:
> * Handled the end-to-end process including the design, translating it into front-end code, integrating it with the content management system (CMS), and deploying it.
> * Built with NuxtJS, TailwindCSS powered by Netlify CMS.
